Package tellosimulator.controller

Class DroneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • tellosimulator.controller.DroneController
  • public class DroneController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the virtual drone and contains all its logic. It updates and animates all the data stored in the DroneModel which it is assigned to. Its methods execute the commands when called from the CommandHandler. The class also sends asynchronous responses via the CommandResponseSender to the operator once a certain command execution has finished.
    See Also:
    DroneModel, CommandHandler, CommandResponseSender

      • rotate

        private void rotate​(double angle,
                    DroneController.Rotation axis)
        Rotates the drone around a certain axis for the given angle.
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle it should rotate. Will be added to the current rotate value of this axis.
        axis - the rotation axis it should rotate around

      • createRotateAnimation

        private javafx.animation.Timeline createRotateAnimation​(DroneController.Rotation rotation,
                                                        java.lang.Double angle)
        Builds the Timeline for an animated rotation by a certain angle.
        Parameters:
        rotation - Rotation.YAW, Rotation.PITCH or Rotation.ROLL
        angle - the rotation angle
        Returns:
        the timeline to animate

      • updateOrientation

        private void updateOrientation​(double rotateAngle)
        Updates the drone orientation vector. Called when yawing/turning.

      • animate

        private void animate​(javafx.animation.Timeline timeline)
        Plays the timeline and sends ok to the operator once finished playing. Rotors are not stopped.
        Parameters:
        timeline - the timeline with its KeyFrames which should be animated.

      • animate

        private void animate​(javafx.animation.Timeline timeline,
                     boolean landing)
        Plays the timeline and sends ok to the operator once finished playing.
        Parameters:
        timeline - the timeline with its KeyFrames which should be animated.
        landing - indicates if rotors should be stopped after the animation.
